original_text:
You journeyed to the king with oil
    and multiplied your perfumes;
you sent your envoys far off,
    and sent down even to Sheol.
korean_text: 네가 기름을 가지고 몰렉에게 나아가되 향품을 더하였으며 네가 또 사신을 먼 곳에 보내고 스올에까지 내려가게 하였으며

sentences.original_text: You journeyed to the king with oil
you sent your envoys far off
and sent down even to Sheol
